text: From no selfies to perfecting the curtsy, the new Duchess will be adjusting to a whole new lifestyle The Royal wedding created a lot of buzz worldwide and was followed by many chanting how ‘ lucky ’ Meghan Markle is to marry a prince. However, what most may not know is that it isn ’ t all fun and games. Becoming a royal comes with a lot of responsibility and rules. Meghan too, will have to adhere to many of these royal rules to avoid major faux pas and stay in the Queen ’ s good books. Compiled from E! News, here are 17 rules the recently appointed Duchess of Sussex will have to follow. 1. No selfies During her first official event with Prince Harry, Meghan revealed that she is no longer able to take selfies with fans.
